document.full_text: the reconstruction of japanese towns and cities devastated by a deadly earthquake and tsunami last month could take a decade, an advisory panel to the government tasked with coming up with a blueprint for rebuilding said on tuesday.
document.title: rebuilding japan's disaster-hit towns may take a decade
lines_and_colors: the reconstruction of japanese towns and cities devastated by a deadly earthquake and tsunami last month could take a decade, an advisory panel to the government tasked with coming up with a blueprint for rebuilding said on tuesday.
